title: Dual-Word Edge Detection
description: Write a function block FB that checks for rising and falling edges in each bit of a dual-word (DWord) input value every cycle. The function block should be able to detect and report changes, rising edges, and falling edges in the input value.
name: BitEdgeDetector

input.name: value
input.description: The input value to be checked for changes and edge triggering

output.name: hasChanged
output.description: True indicates that the input value has changed

output.name: hasRisingEdges
output.description: True indicates that rising edges have occurred in the input value

output.name: risingBits
output.description: The bit stream of rising edges, where each bit indicates whether the corresponding input bit has experienced a rising edge (1 for a rising edge, 0 for no rising edge)

output.name: noOfRisingBits
output.description: The number of rising edges in the input value

output.name: hasFallingEdges
output.description: True indicates that falling edges have occurred in the input value

output.name: fallingBits
output.description: The bit stream of falling edges, where each bit indicates whether the corresponding input bit has experienced a falling edge (1 for a falling edge, 0 for no falling edge)

output.name: noOfFallingBits
output.description: The number of falling edges in the input value
